title: 自制的超级村民
author: 肉盾君
txt_content:
今天给大家分享两个村民，是我没事的时候造的，直接上图。
这个看起来是两个普普通通的村民




2015-02-07_15.33.39.png (411.72 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-2-7 15:53 上传










QQ图片20150207153959.jpg (257.77 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-2-7 15:52 上传






这个是左面的村民，只要用1快烧过的石头就可以换一个神器草方块

下面是使用时的情况：
 




QQ图片20150207155400.jpg (211.71 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-2-7 15:56 上传





    只要拿着这个草方块，就可以得到速度100等效果（自己试），下面是命令
 /summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Profession:5,
CustomName:"小jj",CustomNameVisible:1,
Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:10}],
Offers:{Recipes:[
{maxUses:1,
buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},
sell:{id:2,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Z},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:J},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:S},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:5,UUIDMost:5,Amount:20,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:H},
],
display:{Name:"END",Lore:["神的洗礼"],color:7},
}
}},

]}

}

各位看不懂的同学就复制粘贴就行了。





QQ图片20150207154800.jpg (131.01 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-2-7 15:59 上传





这个就是右面的村民，用5块烧过的石头可以变成一个神器红石火把 





QQ图片20150207154800.jpg (131.01 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2015-2-7 15:49 上传





拿着是这样的：





QQ图片20150207155836.jpg (167.21 KB, 下载次数: 5)

下载附件

2015-2-7 16:01 上传





同样是给了一个速度100的效果，红石火把附魔锋利10000，其他效果，自行体会，下面是命令
 /summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Profession:3,
CustomName:"233",CustomNameVisible:1,
Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:2333}],
Offers:{Recipes:[
{maxUses:10,
buy:{id:1,Count:5,Damage:0},
sell:{id:76,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:233,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount:233,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Z},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:233,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:J},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:4,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:S},
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:5,UUIDMost:5,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:H},
],
display:{Name:"╭(╯^╰)╮",Lore:["哼"],color:7},
ench:[{id:16,lvl:10000},
],StoredEnchantments:[{id:16,lvl:10000},
],}
}},

]}

} 

我不但设了这样一个村民，还做了个超级猪人，请自行下载地图体会。
命令是：
 /setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{EntityId:PigZombie,
SpawnCount:2,
SpawnRange:2,
RequiredPlayerRange:24,
Delay:20,
MinSpawnDelay:10,
MaxSpawnDelay:100,
MaxNearbyEntities:50,
SpawnData:{
ActiveEffects:[{Id:21,Amplifier:10,Duration:99999},
],
Attributes:[
{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:20},
{Name:generic.followRange,Base:20},
{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:20},
{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0},
{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:300},
],
CustomName:"lucky老战士",CustomNameVisible:1,
HealF:300,Equipment:[
{id:268,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,
tag:{
Unbreakable:1b,
ench:[
{id:16,lvl:10000},
{id:17,lvl:10000},
{id:18,lvl:10000},
{id:20,lvl:10000},

],
StoredEnchantments:[
{id:16,lvl:10000},
{id:17,lvl:10000},
{id:18,lvl:10000},
{id:20,lvl:10000},

],
AttributeModifiers:[
{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:20,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G},
],
display:{
Name:"老战士的剑",
Lore:["1889年制造"],
color:FF0000}
}
},{id:313,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,
tag:{
Unbreakable:1b,
CustomPotionEffects:[
{Id:5,Amplifier:10,Duration:9999999},
